title: Listen To The Best Of The Ghost Hunters Audio From Over The Years
description:
Over the years, we've sent Ghosts of Georgia Paranormal Investigations out to investigate so many haunted places, from Bert Show members' houses and our listener's places to Sanitariums and old haunted buildings...and this is the BEST and most TERRIFYING ghostly audio they've picked up!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
